history.narrative: Law 7-10 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-134, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 31, 1987 and April 14, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 6, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-21 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
